summary: A powerful rancher always protects his wild adult son by paying for damages and bribing witnesses, until his crimes become too serious to rectify.
cast: Van Heflin|Tab Hunter|Kathryn Grant|James Darren|Mickey Shaughnessy|Robert F. Simon|Edward Platt|Ray Teal|Paul Birch|Michael Granger|Will Wright|Dorothy Adams|Leon Alton|Harry Antrim|Jack Barry|John Bose|Paul Bradley|Paul Bryar|Paul E. Burns|Wayne Burson|Constance Cameron|Judy Cannon|John Cason|Wheaton Chambers|Chief Blue Eagle|Bert Convy|Watson Downs|Sam Flint|George Ford|Everett Glass|Herman Hack|Brett Halsey|Joseph Hamilton|Shirley Haven|Charles Heard|Jack Kenny|Ann Kunde|Walt La Rue|Gustave Lax|George J. Lewis|Pierce Lyden|Robert Malcolm|David McMahon|Frank Mills|Ewing Mitchell|Irving Mitchell|Bek Nelson|Allen Pinson|Alan Reynolds|Hal Taggart|Russell Thorson|Blaine Turner|Lucille Vance|Gloria Victor|Peggy Whitney
title: El salario de la violencia
